sustainability.policyParagraph1: At AirPark Hotel we pursue a sustainability policy that balances ecological balance with economic growth, ensures the effective use of natural resources, values environmental quality, and meets today's needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own.

sustainability.pdfSectionDescription: You can read the full text of our policy in the document below.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: AirPark Hotel respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data when you use our website or stay at our hotel.
privacyPage.s1Content: We may collect your name, contact details (email, phone, address), identity information, payment details, stay preferences and reservation history. We collect this data when you make a reservation, contact us, use our website or stay at the hotel.
privacyPage.s2Content: We use your data to process reservations, provide accommodation and services, communicate with you, improve our services, comply with legal obligations and, with your consent, send you offers and news.
privacyPage.s3Content: We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes above or as required by law. We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorised access or loss.
privacyPage.s4Content: You have the right to access, correct, delete or restrict the processing of your data, and to object to processing. You may also have the right to data portability and to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details in the footer.
privacyPage.s5Content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at info@airparkhotel.com or call +90 222 724 30 40.

salesPage.title: Distance Sales Agreement
salesPage.intro: This Distance Sales Agreement applies to accommodation and related services you purchase from AirPark Hotel via our website, phone or other remote means.
salesPage.s1Content: Seller: AirPark Hotel, Sivrihisar Havacılık Merkezi, Yeşilköy, 26600 Sivrihisar/Eskişehir. Buyer: the guest who makes the reservation.
salesPage.s2Content: The subject of the contract is the accommodation and related services described at the time of booking. The contract is concluded when the buyer completes the reservation and receives confirmation. Prices and payment terms are as stated during the booking process.
salesPage.s3Content: According to applicable law, the right of withdrawal may not apply to accommodation services for a specific date or period. Cancellation conditions stated at the time of booking apply. We recommend that you read the cancellation policy before confirming your reservation.
salesPage.s4Content: Any complaint regarding the service must be reported to the hotel as soon as possible. For disputes, the courts and enforcement offices of the seller's location are authorised. Consumer rights under local law remain reserved.
salesPage.s5Content: For questions about reservations or this agreement: info@airparkhotel.com, +90 222 724 30 40.

disclosurePage.title: Disclosure Text
disclosurePage.intro: As AirPark Hotel, we process your personal data in the capacity of data controller within the framework of the Turkish Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) and applicable legislation. This text is intended to inform you about the processing of your personal data.
disclosurePage.s1Content: AirPark Hotel, located at Sivrihisar Havacılık Merkezi, Yeşilköy, 26600 Sivrihisar/Eskişehir, is the data controller for the personal data you provide through our website, reservation system or during your stay.
disclosurePage.s2Content: Your personal data may be processed for the purposes of performing the accommodation contract, providing services, managing reservations, fulfilling legal obligations, ensuring security and, subject to your consent, carrying out marketing and communication activities.
disclosurePage.s3Content: Processing is based on the performance of the contract, legal obligation, legitimate interest of the data controller or your explicit consent, depending on the purpose of processing.
disclosurePage.s4Content: Under KVKK Article 11 you have the right to learn whether your data is processed, to request correction or deletion, to object to processing and to lodge a complaint with the Personal Data Protection Board. You may submit your requests to us in writing or by other methods prescribed by the Board.
disclosurePage.s5Content: For requests regarding your personal data: info@airparkhotel.com or our address above. We will respond within the periods stipulated by law.

cancellationPage.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPage.subtitle: Reservation Terms
cancellationPage.intro: Please read our cancellation policy below. We recommend booking with peace of mind and contacting us if your plans change.
cancellationPage.s1Content: You may cancel your reservation free of charge until 14 days before the check-in date. Cancellations must be made by the same channel used for booking (e.g. phone or email to the hotel) and confirmed by us.
cancellationPage.s2Content: If you cancel between 14 days and 2 days before check-in, the first night will be charged. Cancellations made within 2 days of check-in or after the scheduled check-in time may result in a charge of the full stay.
cancellationPage.s3Content: If you do not arrive and do not cancel your reservation (no-show), the full amount of the reservation may be charged.
cancellationPage.s4Content: Changes to dates or room type are subject to availability and rate differences. Please contact us as soon as possible to modify your booking.
cancellationPage.s5Content: For cancellations or questions: info@airparkhotel.com or +90 222 724 30 40. We will confirm your cancellation in writing (e.g. by email) upon request.
